chapter.title: Future
chapter.para: Simple Lottery, whilst functional, is not a finished product or web application. Many functions are rough around their edges, need optimization or improvements.

section.title: Potential Plans
section.para: The following points represent a small list of ideas and aspects which could be done when more time and resources get invested into this web application to make it a production ready product.

To make this lottery system ready, I would:
Add more unit tests to all modules
Turn email into a required field
Add more inline documentation
Expand the frontend and make it more pretty with custom CSS (LessCSS/SaSS)
Provide the user with an option to have a list of entered lotteries in the past
Provide either a management command to send out an email to winners after the lottery finishes or give the user an on-page solution where he can see which lotteries he has won after they finished
Provide filters or an overall better admin view for the winner list
